content:
### Bug fixes

* **core:** Fix crash on webhook when last node did not return data
* [EmailReadImap Node:](/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.emailimap.md) Fix issue that crashed process if node was configured wrong.
* [Google Tasks Node:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googletasks.md) Fix 'Show Completed' option and hide title field where not needed.
* [NocoDB Node:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.nocodb.md) Fix pagination.
* [Salesforce Node:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.salesforce.md) Fix issue that 'status' did not get used for Case => Create & Update
